name: International Parcel Tankers Association
goal: IPTA members carry out the global transport of bulk liquids including petrochemicals, solvents, waxes and vegetable oils.  IPTA represents its members in the regulatory and legislative arena in order to promote safe, efficient and environmentally friendly carriage of such products.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Transport
euInitiatives:
Reduction of GHG emissions from shipping and the regulation on monitoring, reporting and verification of emissions.
Port waste reception facilities.
Ship recycling.
